info.title: Jeopardy! API
info.description: JSON API serving roughly 200,000 trivia questions from the popular gameshow, Jeopardy! spanning 1984 - 2012.

get.description: Returns a single question by ID.</br> **question**:</br>      **id**: Question ID</br>      **body**: Jeopardy! clue</br>      **response**: Jeopardy! answer</br>      **value**: Question dollar value; Final Jeopardy questions have 0 value</br>      **category**: Category of question</br>          **id**: Category ID</br>          **name**: Category name</br>          **url**: link to category</br>      **from_round**: Information on round in which question appeared</br>          **id**: Round ID</br>          **name**: Jeopardy!, Double Jeopardy! or Final Jeopardy!</br>          **url**: link to round</br>          **from_show**: Information on show in which round appeared</br>              **id**: Show ID</br>              **show_number**: Jeopardy! show number</br>              **air_date**: Date the show aired YYYY-DD-MM</br>              **url**: link to show

Returns a random question.</br> **question**:</br>      **id**: Question ID</br>      **body**: Jeopardy! clue</br>      **response**: Jeopardy! answer</br>      **value**: Question dollar value; Final Jeopardy questions have 0 value</br>      **category**: Category of question</br>          **id**: Category ID</br>          **name**: Category name</br>          **url**: link to category</br>      **from_round**: Information on round in which question appeared</br>          **id**: Round ID</br>          **name**: Jeopardy!, Double Jeopardy! or Final Jeopardy!</br>          **url**: link to round</br>          **from_show**: Information on show in which round appeared</br>              **id**: Show ID</br>              **show_number**: Jeopardy! show number</br>              **air_date**: Date the show aired YYYY-DD-MM</br>              **url**: link to show

parameters.name: newer_than
parameters.description: Lower bound to search from (YYYY-DD-MM), starting from 1984-09-10 [Optional]

parameters.name: older_than
parameters.description: Upper bound to search to (YYYY-DD-MM), up to 2012-01-27 [Optional]

get.description: Use to retrieve a single round by ID. </br> _Explanation of response attributes_</br> **round**</br>      **id**: ID of round</br>      **name**: Jeopardy!, Double Jeopardy! or Final Jeopardy!</br>      **from_show**: Information about show where this round appeared</br>          **id**: ID of show</br>          **show_number**: Jeopardy! show number</br>          **air_date**: Date the show aired YYYY-DD-MM</br>          **url**: Link to show</br>      **categories**: Array of categories appearing in round</br>          **id**: ID of category</br>          **name**: Category name</br>          **url**: Link to category</br>      **questions**: Array of questions appearing in round</br>          **id**: ID of question</br>          **body**: Jeopardy! clue</br>          **response**: Jeopardy! answer</br>          **value**: Question dollar value; Final Jeopardy questions have 0 value</br>          **url**: Link to question</br>          **category**: Category of question</br>              **id**: ID of category</br>              **name**: Category name</br>              **url**: link to category
get.summary: Retrieve a single round by ID

get.description: Search across questions and categories</br> _Explanation of response attributes_</br> **query**: Search term</br> **category_count**: Number of categories matching query</br> **question_count**: Number of questions matching query</br> **categories**: Array containing matching categories</br>      **id**: Category ID</br>      **name**: Name of category</br>      **url**: Link to category</br> **questions**: Array containing matching questions</br>      **body**: Jeopardy! clue</br>      **response**: Jeopardy! answer</br>      **value**: Question dollar value; Final Jeopardy questions have 0 value</br>      **url**: Link to question

Returns all categories paginated with 10 per page.</br> **categories**: Array containing categories</br>      **id**: Category ID</br>      **name**: Category name</br>      **url**: Link to category</br>      **questions_count**: Number of questions having this category</br>          Note that this only includes shows revealed during the show</br> **meta**: Information on pages</br>      **current_page**: Current page</br>      **next_page**: Next page, if available</br>      **prev_page**: Previous page, if available</br>      **total_pages**: Total number of pages</br>      **total_count**: Total number of Category objects

parameters.name: popular
parameters.description: Limits results to X most popular categories, paginated with 10 per page. [Optional]

get.description: Use to retrieve all shows with three objects per page. </br> _Explanation of response attributes_</br> **shows**: Array of 3 shows</br>      **id**: ID of show</br>      **show_number**: Jeopardy! show number</br>      **air_date**: Date the show aired YYYY-DD-MM</br>      **categories**: Array of categories appearing in show</br>          **id**: ID of category</br>          **name**: Category name</br>          **url**: Link to category</br>      **rounds**: Array of rounds appearing in show</br>          **id**: ID of rounds</br>          **name**: Jeopardy!, Double Jeopardy! or Final Jeopardy!</br>          **url**: Link to round</br>          **questions**: Array of questions appearing in round</br>              **id**: ID of question</br>              **body**: Jeopardy! clue</br>              **response**: Jeopardy! answer</br>              **value**: Question dollar value; Final Jeopardy questions have 0 value</br>              **url**: Link to question</br>              **category**: Category of question</br>                  **id**: ID of category</br>                  **name**: Category name</br>                  **url**: link to category</br> **meta**: Information on pages</br>      **current_page**: Current page</br>      **next_page**: Next page, if available</br>      **prev_page**: Previous page, if available</br>      **total_pages**: Total number of pages</br>      **total_count**: Total number of Show objects

parameters.name: chrono_sort
parameters.description: "old" to sort in ascending chronological order, "recent" for descending. [Optional]

get.description: Use to retrieve one show by id </br> _Explanation of response attributes_</br> **show**</br>      **id**: ID of show</br>      **show_number**: Jeopardy! show number</br>      **air_date**: Date the show aired YYYY-DD-MM</br>      **categories**: Array of categories appearing in show</br>          **id**: ID of category</br>          **name**: Category name</br>          **url**: Link to category</br>      **rounds**: Array of rounds appearing in show</br>          **id**: ID of rounds</br>          **name**: Jeopardy!, Double Jeopardy! or Final Jeopardy!</br>          **url**: Link to round</br>          **questions**: Array of questions appearing in round</br>              **id**: ID of question</br>              **body**: Jeopardy! clue</br>              **response**: Jeopardy! answer</br>              **value**: Question dollar value; Final Jeopardy questions have 0 value</br>              **url**: Link to question</br>              **category**: Category of question</br>                  **id**: ID of category</br>                  **name**: Category name</br>                  **url**: link to category
get.summary: Retrieve a single show by ID
